chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:
As soon as you start the main camera on the back, it vibrates (perhaps the image stabilizer) so much that no pictures or videos are possible. This problem has been there since I first started using the phone. A restart or anything else doesn't change the problem.
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, Good condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a 40 euros deduction is reasonable which indicates that the customer receives a partial refund. Please check with the customer and get back to me. 

Thank you,
Regards,
KJ

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for your message. 

If the device is not reparable, kindly issue the full refund, as there is no guideline in our quality charter that suggests a price deduction. 

Otherwise, we are obliged to continue by refunding the customer ourselves. 

We appreciate your cooperation. 

Kind regards,
Tansu from Back Market

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist mit Code/Muster gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the device seems to be locked with a code. Kindly assist us in resolving this issue in order for us to proceed. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for your message. 

Please send the item back to the customer so that she can unlock it. Due to data protection, we are not allowed to ask the customer for the code.

Kind regards,
Tansu from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have managed to resolve the above issue. However, may we check if the customer has dropped the device before?

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for your message.

There is no indication that the phone was dropped. 

Kind regards,

Tansu from Back Market
